description: Grove 12 of Sabaody Archipelago, where the final confrontation between the Straw Hat Pirates and Bartholomew Kuma takes place, resulting in the complete separation of the crew.

keyEvents.title: Systematic Crew Separation Begins
keyEvents.description: Grove 12 becomes the site of the Straw Hat Pirates' greatest defeat as Bartholomew Kuma systematically sends each crew member flying to different locations.
keyEvents.significance: This location marks the end of an era for the Straw Hat Pirates and becomes one of the most tragic locations in One Piece history.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Complete Breakdown
keyEvents.description: Alone on Grove 12 after all his crewmates have vanished, Luffy experiences his most devastating emotional breakdown.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Luffy's dream seemingly dies, becoming a pivotal moment in his journey as a captain and pirate.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh vs. Kizaru Battle Continues
keyEvents.description: Silvers Rayleigh continues his battle with Admiral Kizaru on Grove 12, preventing the Admiral from interfering but unable to stop Kuma's plan.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the clash between legendary pirates and Marine Admirals while showing even legends have limits.

statusHistory.reason: Sabaody Archipelago remains operational as a key location in One Piece
